reviewtext: I bought these in 1999, and I still use them all the time in 2012.  The sound quality and comfort are excellent, and the build quality is impressive: they are still in good shape after 12 years.  I replaced the earpads three or four years ago, and they are still basically like new.  In an age of stuff that breaks and fails and gets thrown away, I just wanted to stop in and pay my respects to Sennheiser for building something good that lasts for a long time.
